#summary Session requests.

= Session requests =

== Session start ==
To start session use

{{{
/session/start/
}}}

which returns 
{{{
{
    "num_of_results": 1,
    "code": 0,
    "data": [
    {
        "photo_server": "http://static.dood.pl/photos/",
        "key": "anlFT7KP",
        "categories_date": "34635735",
        "date": "2452642642",
        "model": "ApiSession",
        "id": "anlFT7KP"
    }
    ]
}
}}}


== Login user ==

To login user use

{{{
/session/login/
}}}

with parameters

{{{
email
password
}}}
